hero_section.title: Discover insights from your journal with AI
hero_section.description: Our AI-powered journal analyzes your entries to help you understand patterns, emotions, and growth opportunities in your writing.

features_section.title: Powerful Features
features_section.subHeading: Unlock the full potential of your journaling experience

features.title: AI Analysis
features.description: Our advanced AI analyzes your journal entries to identify patterns, emotions, and insights.

features.title: Mood Tracking
features.description: Track your emotional well-being over time with visual charts and personalized insights.

features.title: Private & Secure
features.description: Your journal entries are encrypted and never shared with third parties.

how_it_works_section.title: How It Works
how_it_works_section.subHeading: Getting started with JournalSense is simple and straightforward

steps.title: Create an Account
steps.description: Sign up for a free account to get started with JournalSense.

steps.title: Write Your Entries
steps.description: Start journaling about your day, thoughts, and feelings.

steps.title: Get AI Insights
steps.description: Receive personalized insights and analysis based on your journal entries.

testimonials_section.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials_section.subHeading: Hear from people who have transformed their journaling experience with JournalSense.

testimonials.name: Sarah K.
testimonials.quote: JournalSense has helped me understand my writing patterns and emotional trends. It's like having a personal therapist and writing coach in one.

testimonials.name: Michael T.
testimonials.quote: I've been journaling for years, but the insights from JournalSense have taken my self-reflection to a whole new level.

testimonials.name: Jessica M.
testimonials.quote: I recommend JournalSense to my clients as a tool for self-discovery. The AI analysis provides valuable insights between our sessions.

call_to_action.title: Ready to transform your journaling experience?
call_to_action.description: Join thousands of users who are discovering new insights about themselves through AI-powered journaling.

company_info.name: JournalSense
company_info.tagline: Transforming journaling with the power of AI.
